body.p:
D.G. Fowler Esq
Dr John M. Johnston
Paducah Ky --

You will please go to Cairo without delay, enquire into the fact, connected with the arrest of two of our citizens upon our own soil by troops from Cairo reported to me by D. G. Fowler of Paducah and report to me. Lay the matter before Genl Prentiss & protest against the act. & obtain if possible their release -- If Report as soon as may be --
